text:
@JimInhofe @realDonaldTrump @POTUS How about extending the $600 unemployment benefit. Helping a small business or any business won’t matter if they’re losing customers.
And also stop the evictions of millions of families set to take place. This is all due to the ineffective response to Covid-19 by Trump & YOU!
